ds.graphics
Class Shape

java.lang.Object
  ds.graphics.Shape
Direct Known Subclasses:
CircleShape, LineShape, PolyShape, RectShape, TextShape
public abstract class Shape
extends java.lang.Object

A base class for the graphics hierarchy that specifies a base point (x,y) and the color of each figure.

             double y,

y - y-coordinate for the base point.
